name: Lobber
body:
This is Lobber, an application for sharing files using BitTorrent technology.
There's a web interface as well as a RESTful http API.

More Lobber repositories:
[Java Applet BitTorrent Client](https://github.com/SUNET/lobber-client), 
[Deluge plugin for Lobber](https://github.com/SUNET/lobber-deluge-core), 
[Standalone storage node for lobber](https://github.com/SUNET/lobber-storagenode)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
